6502 #define DCLOG_VERBOSE(vlevel, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CLOG_VERBOSE(vlevel, __VA_ARGS__)
6503 #define DCVLOG(vlevel, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CVLOG(vlevel, __VA_ARGS__)
6504 // Conditional logs
6505 #define DCLOG_IF(condition, LEVEL, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CLOG_IF(condition, LEVEL, __VA_ARGS__)
6506 #define DCVLOG_IF(condition, vlevel, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CVLOG_IF(condition, vlevel, __VA_ARGS__)
6507 // Hit counts based logs
6508 #define DCLOG_EVERY_N(n, LEVEL, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CLOG_EVERY_N(n, LEVEL, __VA_ARGS__)
6509 #define DCVLOG_EVERY_N(n, vlevel, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CVLOG_EVERY_N(n, vlevel, __VA_ARGS__)
6510 #define DCLOG_AFTER_N(n, LEVEL, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CLOG_AFTER_N(n, LEVEL, __VA_ARGS__)
6511 #define DCVLOG_AFTER_N(n, vlevel, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CVLOG_AFTER_N(n, vlevel, __VA_ARGS__)
6512 #define DCLOG_N_TIMES(n, LEVEL, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CLOG_N_TIMES(n, LEVEL, __VA_ARGS__)
6513 #define DCVLOG_N_TIMES(n, vlevel, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CVLOG_N_TIMES(n, vlevel, __VA_ARGS__)
6514 //
6515 // Default Debug Only Loggers macro using CLOG(), CLOG_VERBOSE() and CVLOG() macros
6516 //
6517 // undef existing
6518 #undef DLOG
6519 #undef DVLOG
6520 #undef DLOG_IF
6521 #undef DVLOG_IF
6522 #undef DLOG_EVERY_N
6523 #undef DVLOG_EVERY_N
6524 #undef DLOG_AFTER_N
6525 #undef DVLOG_AFTER_N
6526 #undef DLOG_N_TIMES
6527 #undef DVLOG_N_TIMES
6528 // Normal logs
6529 #define DLOG(LEVEL) DCLOG(LEVEL, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6530 #define DVLOG(vlevel) DCVLOG(vlevel, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6531 // Conditional logs
6532 #define DLOG_IF(condition, LEVEL) DCLOG_IF(condition, LEVEL, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6533 #define DVLOG_IF(condition, vlevel) DCVLOG_IF(condition, vlevel, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6534 // Hit counts based logs
6535 #define DLOG_EVERY_N(n, LEVEL) DCLOG_EVERY_N(n, LEVEL, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6536 #define DVLOG_EVERY_N(n, vlevel) DCVLOG_EVERY_N(n, vlevel, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6537 #define DLOG_AFTER_N(n, LEVEL) DCLOG_AFTER_N(n, LEVEL, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6538 #define DVLOG_AFTER_N(n, vlevel) DCVLOG_AFTER_N(n, vlevel, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6539 #define DLOG_N_TIMES(n, LEVEL) DCLOG_N_TIMES(n, LEVEL, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6540 #define DVLOG_N_TIMES(n, vlevel) DCVLOG_N_TIMES(n, vlevel, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6541 // Check macros
6542 #undef CCHECK
6543 #undef CPCHECK
6544 #undef CCHECK_EQ
6545 #undef CCHECK_NE
6546 #undef CCHECK_LT
6547 #undef CCHECK_GT
6548 #undef CCHECK_LE
6549 #undef CCHECK_GE
6550 #undef CCHECK_BOUNDS
6551 #undef CCHECK_NOTNULL
6552 #undef CCHECK_STRCASEEQ
6553 #undef CCHECK_STRCASENE
6554 #undef CHECK
6555 #undef PCHECK
6556 #undef CHECK_EQ
6557 #undef CHECK_NE
6558 #undef CHECK_LT
6559 #undef CHECK_GT
6560 #undef CHECK_LE
6561 #undef CHECK_GE
6562 #undef CHECK_BOUNDS
6563 #undef CHECK_NOTNULL
6564 #undef CHECK_STRCASEEQ
6565 #undef CHECK_STRCASENE
6566 #define CCHECK(condition, ...) CLOG_IF(!(condition), FATAL, __VA_ARGS__) << "Check failed: [" << #condition << "] "
6567 #define CPCHECK(condition, ...) CPLOG_IF(!(condition), FATAL, __VA_ARGS__) << "Check failed: [" << #condition << "] "
6568 #define CHECK(condition) CCHECK(condition, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6569 #define PCHECK(condition) CPCHECK(condition, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6570 #define CCHECK_EQ(a, b, ...) CCHECK(a == b, __VA_ARGS__)
6571 #define CCHECK_NE(a, b, ...) CCHECK(a != b, __VA_ARGS__)
6572 #define CCHECK_LT(a, b, ...) CCHECK(a < b, __VA_ARGS__)
6573 #define CCHECK_GT(a, b, ...) CCHECK(a > b, __VA_ARGS__)
6574 #define CCHECK_LE(a, b, ...) CCHECK(a <= b, __VA_ARGS__)
6575 #define CCHECK_GE(a, b, ...) CCHECK(a >= b, __VA_ARGS__)
6576 #define CCHECK_BOUNDS(val, min, max, ...) CCHECK(val >= min && val <= max, __VA_ARGS__)
6577 #define CHECK_EQ(a, b) CCHECK_EQ(a, b, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6578 #define CHECK_NE(a, b) CCHECK_NE(a, b, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6579 #define CHECK_LT(a, b) CCHECK_LT(a, b, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6580 #define CHECK_GT(a, b) CCHECK_GT(a, b, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6581 #define CHECK_LE(a, b) CCHECK_LE(a, b, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6582 #define CHECK_GE(a, b) CCHECK_GE(a, b, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6583 #define CHECK_BOUNDS(val, min, max) CCHECK_BOUNDS(val, min, max, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6584 #define CCHECK_NOTNULL(ptr, ...) CCHECK((ptr) != nullptr, __VA_ARGS__)
6585 #define CCHECK_STREQ(str1, str2, ...) CLOG_IF(!el::base::utils::Str::cStringEq(str1, str2), FATAL, __VA_ARGS__) \
6586 << "Check failed: [" << #str1 << " == " << #str2 << "] "
6587 #define CCHECK_STRNE(str1, str2, ...) CLOG_IF(el::base::utils::Str::cStringEq(str1, str2), FATAL, __VA_ARGS__) \
6588 << "Check failed: [" << #str1 << " != " << #str2 << "] "
6589 #define CCHECK_STRCASEEQ(str1, str2, ...) CLOG_IF(!el::base::utils::Str::cStringCaseEq(str1, str2), FATAL, __VA_ARGS__) \
6590 << "Check failed: [" << #str1 << " == " << #str2 << "] "
6591 #define CCHECK_STRCASENE(str1, str2, ...) CLOG_IF(el::base::utils::Str::cStringCaseEq(str1, str2), FATAL, __VA_ARGS__) \
6592 << "Check failed: [" << #str1 << " != " << #str2 << "] "
6593 #define CHECK_NOTNULL(ptr) CCHECK_NOTNULL((ptr), ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6594 #define CHECK_STREQ(str1, str2) CCHECK_STREQ(str1, str2, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6595 #define CHECK_STRNE(str1, str2) CCHECK_STRNE(str1, str2, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6596 #define CHECK_STRCASEEQ(str1, str2) CCHECK_STRCASEEQ(str1, str2, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6597 #define CHECK_STRCASENE(str1, str2) CCHECK_STRCASENE(str1, str2, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6598 #undef DCCHECK
6599 #undef DCCHECK_EQ
6600 #undef DCCHECK_NE
6601 #undef DCCHECK_LT
6602 #undef DCCHECK_GT
6603 #undef DCCHECK_LE
6604 #undef DCCHECK_GE
6605 #undef DCCHECK_BOUNDS
6606 #undef DCCHECK_NOTNULL
6607 #undef DCCHECK_STRCASEEQ
6608 #undef DCCHECK_STRCASENE
6609 #undef DCPCHECK
6610 #undef DCHECK
6611 #undef DCHECK_EQ
6612 #undef DCHECK_NE
6613 #undef DCHECK_LT
6614 #undef DCHECK_GT
6615 #undef DCHECK_LE
6616 #undef DCHECK_GE
6617 #undef DCHECK_BOUNDS_
6618 #undef DCHECK_NOTNULL
6619 #undef DCHECK_STRCASEEQ
6620 #undef DCHECK_STRCASENE
6621 #undef DPCHECK
6622 #define DCCHECK(condition, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK(condition, __VA_ARGS__)
6623 #define DCCHECK_EQ(a, b, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK_EQ(a, b, __VA_ARGS__)
6624 #define DCCHECK_NE(a, b, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK_NE(a, b, __VA_ARGS__)
6625 #define DCCHECK_LT(a, b, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK_LT(a, b, __VA_ARGS__)
6626 #define DCCHECK_GT(a, b, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK_GT(a, b, __VA_ARGS__)
6627 #define DCCHECK_LE(a, b, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK_LE(a, b, __VA_ARGS__)
6628 #define DCCHECK_GE(a, b, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK_GE(a, b, __VA_ARGS__)
6629 #define DCCHECK_BOUNDS(val, min, max, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK_BOUNDS(val, min, max, __VA_ARGS__)
6630 #define DCCHECK_NOTNULL(ptr, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK_NOTNULL((ptr), __VA_ARGS__)
6631 #define DCCHECK_STREQ(str1, str2, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK_STREQ(str1, str2, __VA_ARGS__)
6632 #define DCCHECK_STRNE(str1, str2, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK_STRNE(str1, str2, __VA_ARGS__)
6633 #define DCCHECK_STRCASEEQ(str1, str2, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK_STRCASEEQ(str1, str2, __VA_ARGS__)
6634 #define DCCHECK_STRCASENE(str1, str2, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK_STRCASENE(str1, str2, __VA_ARGS__)
6635 #define DCPCHECK(condition, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CPCHECK(condition, __VA_ARGS__)
6636 #define DCHECK(condition) DCCHECK(condition, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6637 #define DCHECK_EQ(a, b) DCCHECK_EQ(a, b, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6638 #define DCHECK_NE(a, b) DCCHECK_NE(a, b, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6639 #define DCHECK_LT(a, b) DCCHECK_LT(a, b, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6640 #define DCHECK_GT(a, b) DCCHECK_GT(a, b, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6641 #define DCHECK_LE(a, b) DCCHECK_LE(a, b, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6642 #define DCHECK_GE(a, b) DCCHECK_GE(a, b, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6643 #define DCHECK_BOUNDS(val, min, max) DCCHECK_BOUNDS(val, min, max, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6644 #define DCHECK_NOTNULL(ptr) DCCHECK_NOTNULL((ptr), ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6645 #define DCHECK_STREQ(str1, str2) DCCHECK_STREQ(str1, str2, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6646 #define DCHECK_STRNE(str1, str2) DCCHECK_STRNE(str1, str2, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6647 #define DCHECK_STRCASEEQ(str1, str2) DCCHECK_STRCASEEQ(str1, str2, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6648 #define DCHECK_STRCASENE(str1, str2) DCCHECK_STRCASENE(str1, str2, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6649 #define DPCHECK(condition) DCPCHECK(condition, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6650 #if defined(ELPP_DISABLE_DEFAULT_CRASH_HANDLING)
6651 # define ELPP_USE_DEF_CRASH_HANDLER false
6652 #else
6653 # define ELPP_USE_DEF_CRASH_HANDLER true
6654 #endif // defined(ELPP_DISABLE_DEFAULT_CRASH_HANDLING)
6655 #define ELPP_CRASH_HANDLER_INIT
6656 #define ELPP_INIT_EASYLOGGINGPP(val) \
6657 ELPP_INITI_BASIC_DECLR \
6658 namespace el { \
6659 namespace base { \
6660 el::base::type::StoragePointer elStorage(val); \
6661 } \
6662 el::base::debug::CrashHandler elCrashHandler(ELPP_USE_DEF_CRASH_HANDLER); \
6663 }
6664 
6665 #if ELPP_ASYNC_LOGGING
6666 # define INITIALIZE_EASYLOGGINGPP\
6667 ELPP_INIT_EASYLOGGINGPP(new el::base::Storage(el::LogBuilderPtr(new el::base::DefaultLogBuilder()),\
6668 new el::base::AsyncDispatchWorker()))\
6669 
6670 #else
6671 # define INITIALIZE_EASYLOGGINGPP ELPP_INIT_EASYLOGGINGPP(new el::base::Storage(el::LogBuilderPtr(new el::base::DefaultLogBuilder())))
6672 #endif // ELPP_ASYNC_LOGGING
6673 #define INITIALIZE_NULL_EASYLOGGINGPP\
6674 ELPP_INITI_BASIC_DECLR\
6675 namespace el {\
6676 namespace base {\
6677 el::base::type::StoragePointer elStorage;\
6678 }\
6679 el::base::debug::CrashHandler elCrashHandler(ELPP_USE_DEF_CRASH_HANDLER);\
6680 }
6681 // NOTE: no ELPP_INITI_BASIC_DECLR when sharing - causes double free corruption on external symbols
6682 #define SHARE_EASYLOGGINGPP(initializedStorage)\
6683 namespace el {\
6684 namespace base {\
6685 el::base::type::StoragePointer elStorage(initializedStorage);\
6686 }\
6687 el::base::debug::CrashHandler elCrashHandler(ELPP_USE_DEF_CRASH_HANDLER);\
6688 }
6689 
6690 #if defined(ELPP_UNICODE)
6691 # define START_EASYLOGGINGPP(argc, argv) el::Helpers::setArgs(argc, argv); std::locale::global(std::locale(""))
6692 #else
6693 # define START_EASYLOGGINGPP(argc, argv) el::Helpers::setArgs(argc, argv)
6694 #endif // defined(ELPP_UNICODE)
6695 #endif // EASYLOGGINGPP_H
